meanings.definition: In a manner that cannot be expressed in words.
meanings.sent1: The beauty of the sunset was unspeakably breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: She was unspeakably happy when she received the good news.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt at singing was unspeakably hilarious.
meanings.sent4: The mountain peak was unspeakably high, reaching into the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked cookies was unspeakably delightful.

meanings.definition: To an extreme degree that is beyond description.
meanings.sent1: The storm unspeakably devastated the small town.
meanings.sent2: He was unspeakably tired after running a marathon.
meanings.sent3: The toddler's tantrum was unspeakably dramatic.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness unspeakably warmed the hearts of those around her.
meanings.sent5: The singer's voice was unspeakably powerful, moving the audience to tears.
